caption.text:
Finally done! I created a new artwork “power of one #surface / test pattern 2” and I completed to install it in the KOBE FASHION MUSEUM. I used 3 lasers and 6 half mirrors. Concept is time compression and extension. Actually, This is the second pattern of the “power of one #surface” series. In this pattern, Half mirrors are composed like a accordion fold and the lasers are irradiated. The irradiated images intersects at the boundary the mirrors. The time axis(past, present, future) of the images are visualized in symmetry.

Special thanks 
Sound @raykunimoto
